blog.name: first-order-hr
blog.title: First Order Human Resources
blog.description: (If you're an RP blog, I follow back from my Eli Vanto blog.) Hello and welcome to HR. Feel free to ask us any questions or submit any concerns you may have. Also, please fill out our surveys so we can continue to make your First Order experience as pleasant as possible. Thank you and have a productive day.

summary: I wanna file a sexual harassment claim. The General keeps making bedroom eyes at his cup of caf and it is really creeping me...
question: I wanna file a sexual harassment claim. The General keeps making bedroom eyes at his cup of caf and it is really creeping me out.
answer: Human Resources here. Don’t we all? Announcement to all crew: this is an official First Order department, providing a valuable service to all registered First Order™ Officers, Stormtroopers, Loyalists, and Assorted Personnel. As such we are very busy, and extremely underpaid, and therefore do not have the time to waste with what are clearly jokes. Please be advised that further abuse of this service will be reported to, and dealt with by Security at their earliest possible convenience. Have a productive day.

reblog.comment: Human Resources here. Don’t we all? As such we are very busy, and extremely underpaid, and therefore do not have the time to waste with what are clearly jokes. Please be advised that further abuse of this service will be reported to, and dealt with by Security at their earliest possible convenience. Have a productive day.

Please be advised that further abuse of this service will be reported to, and dealt with by Security at their earliest possible convenience. Have a productive day.

blog.name: darknessblackness
blog.title: Exploring the Dark
blog.description:
Blog dedicated to everything on the other side of light, mostly for artistic inspiration. 

In no way this blog attempts to shift one's religious beliefs or spiritual journeys. 

Furthermore, this blog is not promoting suicidal or depressing thinking, but on the contrary tries to explore the beauty & destroy the stereotypes & negativity.

None of the photos or artworks posted here are my own, unless mentioned.

blog.name: first-order-hr
blog.title: First Order Human Resources
blog.description: (If you're an RP blog, I follow back from my Eli Vanto blog.) Hello and welcome to HR. Feel free to ask us any questions or submit any concerns you may have. Also, please fill out our surveys so we can continue to make your First Order experience as pleasant as possible. Thank you and have a productive day.

summary: What are the requirements I must meet to apply for work in the med-bay?
question: What are the requirements I must meet to apply for work in the med-bay?
answer: Human Resources here. Like any other First Order employee/conscript you must be able to pass a loyalty test before or after reconditioning. You will also need a valid medical licence from an accredited institution of higher education ie one NOT located on Nar Shaddaa. Alderaanian medical licences are not, and have never been, considered valid by the First Order. For requirements beyond this we suggest you inquire @first-order-medbay. Thank you and have a productive day.

reblog.comment: Human Resources here. Like any other First Order employee/conscript you must be able to pass a loyalty test before or after reconditioning. You will also need a valid medical licence from an accredited institution of higher education ie one NOT located on Nar Shaddaa. Alderaanian medical licences are not, and have never been, considered valid by the First Order. For requirements beyond this we suggest you inquire @first-order-medbay. Thank you and have a productive day.

You will also need a valid medical licence from an accredited institution of higher education ie one NOT located on Nar Shaddaa. Alderaanian medical licences are not, and have never been, considered valid by the First Order. For requirements beyond this we suggest you inquire @first-order-medbay. Thank you and have a productive day.
trail.content: Human Resources here. Like any other First Order employee/conscript you must be able to pass a loyalty test before or after reconditioning. You will also need a valid medical licence from an accredited institution of higher education ie one NOT located on Nar Shaddaa. Alderaanian medical licences are not, and have never been, considered valid by the First Order. For requirements beyond this we suggest you inquire @first-order-medbay. Thank you and have a productive day.

blog.name: ao3feed-theforceawakens
blog.title: AO3Feed-The Force Awakens
blog.description: Fan fiction for Star Wars: The Force Awakens

title: The Beautiful Side Of Maybe
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PdnfUZ

by BlueDameron79

While on a mission, Poe Dameron, the Resistance’s best pilot, gets sucked through a freak black hole type portal and ends up in a new galaxy, our galaxy. He finds earth and is surprised at what he finds. How will he survive? Despite growing up around many different species of alien, he himself has never felt like an alien.

[MATURE WARNING]
•Suicide themes/mentions (no actual death)
•Depression themes

Words: 3864, Chapters: 3/3, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Poe Dameron, Leia Organa, Temmin “Snap” Wexley, Original Characters
  • Relationships: Poe Dameron/Original Female Character(s), Poe Dameron/Original Character(s)
  • Additional Tags: Angst with a Happy Ending, Heartbreak, Alternate Universe, Love, Suicide Attempt, No Smut


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PdnfUZ

summary: what should’ve been (& what was); s p e c t r e s .
title: what should’ve been (& what was); s p e c t r e s .
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ry2Zzr

by stardustgirl

Essentially, my friend gave me a list of Happy![insert character here] AU prompts, which I then…angstified. Here’s the first part (only Spectre Cell), and I promise they get both better and worse (in terms of angst mainly) as they go.
So have fun.
(And keep in mind each chapter is its own AU and, for the most part, none overlap.)

I’m also likely making some of these an actual oneshot on their own, so let me know which sentences are your favorite!

Words: 236, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of what should’ve been (& what was)

  • Fandoms: Star Wars: Rebels, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M, Gen
  • Characters: Ezra Bridger, Sabine Wren, Garazeb “Zeb” Orrelios, C1-10P | Chopper, Hera Syndulla, Kanan Jarrus, Cham Syndulla, Hera Syndulla’s mother, Tristan Wren, Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Luke Skywalker, Jacen Syndulla
  • Relationships: Ezra Bridger & Kanan Jarrus, Ezra Bridger & Sabine Wren, Ezra Bridger/Sabine Wren, Kanan Jarrus/Hera Syndulla, Kanan Jarrus & Hera Syndulla, Garazeb “Zeb” Orrelios & Sabine Wren, Ezra Bridger & Garazeb “Zeb” Orrelios, Wedge Antilles/Sabine Wren, Wedge Antilles & Sabine Wren, Sabine Wren & Tristan Wren, Cham Syndulla & Hera Syndulla, Cham Syndulla/Hera Syndulla’s mother, C1-10P | Chopper & Kanan Jarrus & Garazeb “Zeb” Orrelios & Hera Syndulla & Sabine Wren, C1-10P | Chopper & Hera Syndulla, Cham Syndulla & C1-10P | Chopper, Hera Syndulla & Jacen Syndulla, Kanan Jarrus & Jacen Syndulla, Jacen Syndulla & Sabine Wren, Ben Solo & Jacen Syndulla, Ezra Bridger & Hera Syndulla, Hera Syndulla & Sabine Wren, Luke Skywalker & Jacen Syndulla, Ben Solo | Kylo Ren & Jacen Syndulla
  • Additional Tags: Angst, heavy heavy angst, Happy AU, dark au, Alternate Universe, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Alternate Universe - Dark, Dark, Very very dark


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ry2Zzr

title: The Beautiful Side Of Maybe
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PdnfUZ

by BlueDameron79

While on a mission, Poe Dameron, the Resistance’s best pilot, gets sucked through a freak black hole type portal and ends up in a new galaxy, our galaxy. He finds earth and is surprised at what he finds. How will he survive? Despite growing up around many different species of alien, he himself has never felt like an alien.

[MATURE WARNING]
•Suicide themes/mentions (no actual death)
•Depression themes

Words: 992, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Poe Dameron, Leia Organa, Temmin “Snap” Wexley, Original Characters
  • Relationships: Poe Dameron/Original Female Character(s), Poe Dameron/Original Character(s)
  • Additional Tags: Angst with a Happy Ending, Heartbreak, Alternate Universe, Love, Suicide Attempt, No Smut

blog.name: megilins
blog.title: but not to me
blog.description: sw sideblog / sometimes I make content / mostly I reblog stuff

summary: confession: I watched the movies in english only like once, so to me the natural english voices are actually the voice actors...
body:
confession: I watched the movies in english only like once, so to me the natural english voices are actually the voice actors from the farce awakens lol

and yes, that means that when i read all of y’alls fanfics i read them with THOSE voices lol

reblog.comment:

blog.name: darththraw
blog.description: Darth Thraw, an in construction post-Empire Sith OC

summary: “Peace is a lie, there is only passion.”
body:
The Sith and their passions

Far too often the Sith are extreme reactionary to the ways of the Jedi, taking up a point of contestation not because of the belief or its validity but simply because it is contrary to Jedi teachings. This does not mean that there are not important truths in such teachings, glimmers of great understanding hidden by petty contempt.

One such example is the maxim that initiates the Sith code


“Peace is a lie, there is only passion.”


Throughout the galaxy and history this statement is proven true. All peace is fleeting, existing for moments before being snuffed out and replaced with conflict. This is because conflict is the natural order of the Force itself and the Force resides in and connects all things. On all levels of life conflict of some sort drives existence, those who achieve the peace to permanently suspend conflict become locked in a trance like state to wither and die without action. While their heart still beats it is foolish to consider that living and is an abhorrent crime against the Force.

The failure of the Sith in this matter is not the truth of the statement but instead the use of it as an excuse to entirely give in to and lose one’s self to their passion. In this manner the Jedi also have a sliver a truth hidden amongst their idealist dogma. Control of one’s passions is essential, though the avoidance of having passions that the Jedi attempt to exhibit is also fallacy.

Instead it should be one’s goal to accept their passions and then control them to be harnessed as needed to maximize the associated affect. This is true for all passions and emotions, from the pure power of wrath to the subtle influences of love. They all have their time and their place, they are all useable to serve one’s goals and ambitions. But they also all carry the risk of being lost to the passions itself.

It is in this way previous Sith have failed to maximize their potential in their passions or to understand the truth they already held dear.
